official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the designation of the period July 16 through 24 as "United States Space Observance".

summary.text: Requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the period of July 16 through 24 as "United States Space Observance."

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the designation of the period July 16 through 24 as "United States Space Observance".
